description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity of an Android application that displays a list of notes with search functionality and a floating action button to add new notes.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity responsible for displaying notes, handling search action, and menu options.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up view bindings, toolbar, recycler view, adapter, and FAB.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Reloads notes each time the activity resumes.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of notes from the repository based on current query.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the menu, sets up the search view, and handles search query changes.
